meanings.definition: The state or quality of being an adult.
meanings.sent1: Her adultnesses showed in the way she handled responsibilities.
meanings.sent2: The adultnesses of the group made decision-making easier.
meanings.sent3: His adultnesses shone through when he paid his bills on time.
meanings.sent4: The adultnesses of the situation demanded a mature response.
meanings.sent5: The adultnesses of the forest at night were both calming and mysterious.

meanings.definition: The characteristics or traits of an adult.
meanings.sent1: The adultnesses of wisdom and experience were evident in her advice.
meanings.sent2: His adultnesses included responsibility and reliability.
meanings.sent3: The cat's adultnesses were clear when it refused to play with toys.
meanings.sent4: The adultnesses of the old tree made it stand out in the forest.
meanings.sent5: The adultnesses of the storm were felt in the strong winds and dark clouds.
